themeparks 0.1.0

Get entity children

get_entity_children.Rd

Get all children for a given entity document

Usage

get_entity_children(entity_id)

Arguments

entity_id

Either the GUID or the slug string for a given entity

Value

A data frame with details about the given entity's children

Details

This is recursive, so a destination will return all parks and all rides within those parks.

Examples

## Entity children data for Walt Disney World
# \donttest{
get_entity_children("waltdisneyworldresort")
#> # A tibble: 518 × 12
#>    id                       name  entity_type timezone children_id children_name
